title: 客户端崩溃

txt_content:

错误报告上传了

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content: 我建议楼主用crafttweaker配合modtweaker,两者兼容会更好点

replies.author: skyinr
replies.txt_content:
你的modtweaker2加载失败
删掉吧 或者重新下一个回来

replies.author: Gingerbread
replies.txt_content: UCHE        modtweaker2{0.9.6} [Mod Tweaker 2] (ModTweaker2-0.9.6.jar) 复制代码加载ModTweaker时出现错误，可以选择删除。
